you_kitten_1: Rest now, little one. Dream of the great warrior you'll become one day.
stable_8: Your little button nose and beady eyes, your fluffy tail and ears.
I could just gobble you up- No! No, no, no, no, no... That was a joke, I didn't mean to make you cry...
stable_9: Look at you, young one. Soon it won't be long before your running around camp, stirring up a storm.
I remember when I was that age, goodness, that was so long ago. Well, not that I remember, what I could see nor hear- but I remember my parent's voice.
Their calm whispers of support, their promises of love and the way they said my name- I don't remember much, but just a sense of protection. A sense of love.
Little kit, you may not remember this when you're older, but I hope you remember this feeling of warmth.
So I'll say this, you are loved y_c, loved by c_n and all the cats here. We can't wait to see what you do next.
stable_9_2: Why do you look like that?
you_kitten_2: Hey, kit! Let's practice the hunting crouch.
[t_c inspects you as you get into position.]
Hmm, not bad! You'll be a great hunter one day.
you_kitten_3: Heh, you didn't see me coming, did you, little one?
One day you'll be as sneaky as me.
you_kitten_4: It's important to listen and learn, little y_c. This clan relies on each of us doing our part.
you_kitten_5: Oh! Be careful near the brambles, dear kit. It's easy to get hurt.
you_kitten_6: Stay close to your mentor, once you're an apprentice.
c_nClan's territory spans thousands of tail-lengths. It's easy to get lost if you wander too far.
introspective_leafbare: [t_c is sat in the corner, with a clump of snow on their head.]
[You decide to leave them to it...?]
assertive_yougrief1: [When you ask t_c what happened to d_c, and if you'll ever see them again, something on their face breaks.]
Ah ... Ah, kid, I'm so sorry ...
It ain't right, what happened to d_c ...
But, mark my words, you haven't seen the last of them. Though, it may be a while. They're up in StarClan now, with our warrior ancestors.
One day, you'll reunite again. But until then, just know they're up there watching over you, helping you grow strong and healthy.
Can you try to grow up strong and healthy for them?
you_newborn2: Oh! Oh! Look, r_c. y_c is purring!
you_kitten_7: Hey there, little y_c. You've got quite the spark in those eyes.
You remind me of me when I was your age. Destined for greatness, I can tell.
you_kitten_8: The forest hides many secrets, y_c.
You might think it's all fun and games now, but there's a darkness out there.
Just... be careful. Not everything is as it seems.
you_kitten_brooding: Never take things at face value, little kit. That's a lesson I'd had to learn.
you_kitten_brooding2: Hmph... I have no time to speak with you, kit. Go back to the nursery.
you_kitten_brooding3: When you grow up, y_c, you'll see that sometimes breaking the rules can lead you to greater truths.
The Warrior Code isn't everything. Keep an open mind, okay?
you_kitten_9: Wanna see me sneak past the elder's den without them noticing?
It's all in the paws, watch and learn!
Haha, did you see that? They didn't even blink!
you_kitten_10: The stars seem so distant, yet I feel like our ancestors are right here, watching over us.
Do you ever wonder, y_c, about our purpose in this vast clan?
Ah... you're too young to be thinking of this.
you_kitten_11: Rules are there for a reason, y_c.
But sometimes, I can't help but wonder if they're truly for our own good.
Still, we must respect them. That's what being a part of c_nClan means.
you_kitten_12: You worried about your first hunt, y_c?
Ah, don't sweat it. Just be yourself and trust your instincts.
Remember, every cat started somewhere. You got this.
you_kitten_13: Hey y_c, bet I can catch that butterfly before you!
brooding_newborn1: Can it even hear what I'm saying right now?
brooding_kitten1: Uh. I don't really know how to talk to kits ...
brooding_kitten2: Don't you have something better to be doing?
Stop bothering me, and go find someone else to annoy.
brooding_kitten3: What is it? Can't you see that I'm busy?
You want to ... play a game with me?
Hmph. I haven't 'played' since I was in the nursery. Do yourself a favor and find someone who has nothing better to do.
brooding_kitten4: y_c. I have something for you.
[t_c drops a smooth pebble at your paws.]
I ... saw it on patrol, and thought you might like it to play with.
brooding_kitten5: Hm? Why are you crying, y_c?
One of the other kits called you ugly?
brooding_kitten5_2: [t_c points out a bird perching on a tree in camp.]
That's called a robin. Pretty, huh?
[t_c spends the rest of the morning quietly pointing out all the birds around camp, and telling you their names.]
brooding_kitten6: StarClan, I have the worst headache ...
brooding_kitten7: What is it? What do you need?
How about, for the future, we set up a policy where you only come and find me if you really, really need something. Okay?
brooding_kitten8: Tch. Not now, y_c. I'm not interested in kit games.
Heh. I used to love that game.
And you speak of this to anyone, I'll never play with you again. Got it?
they_grieving: [t_c doesn't seem like they want to talk right now.]
general_2: As if I couldn't like you any less ...
parent_you_ill: [You wake up in the middle of the night to a warmth against your pelt and soft humming.]
[Looking up, you see t_c pressed against your side, humming a lullaby they used to sing to you].
[You close your eyes and drift off to sleep again, comforted by their presence.]
brooding_insult_1: What did you just say to me ... ?
brooding_insult_3: [t_c curls their lip at you and stalks away.]
neurotic_insult_1: Oh yeah? Well you're a - a ... uhm ... uh ...
Ugh! I can't think of a comeback!
neurotic_insult_2: Is that really how you think of me?
cool_insult_2: Aw, look! It thinks it's clever.
sweet_insult_1: That's not very nice of you to say...
sweet_insult_3: You... you don't really mean that... do you, y_c...?
silly_insult_4: Oh, like I'd take anything you say seriously.
silly_insult_7: Haha...ha... I'll... um, keep that in mind next time we talk.
silly_insult_8: Is someone hungry? Because you're really not acting like yourself. Have a snack, y_c.
unlawful_insult_1: ...you should take that back. Before someone gets hurt.
unlawful_insult_2: ...You're lucky that r_c is here. Otherwise, I don't think you'd want to know what I would do to you.
unlawful_insult_3: ...you're so damn lucky I haven't shredded you to pieces yet.
unabashed_insult_2: I may not be cool, but you're mean. And personally, I think that's worse.
brooding_nice_tokit: You ... want to know if I wanna play with you and r_k?
Er, sorry. I don't really care for kits.
... Yes, I suppose that you are a kit.
I guess you're the only exception.
brooding_nice_tokit1: Uhmm- I mean, I haven't seen you around so often.
You've grown up quite a lot, haven't you?
Sorry, I'm not good at being around with kits. Just- Just get back to the nursery. I think that r_q is waiting for you there.
[t_c lowers their gaze to you sadly, then looks at the nursery before stalking off.]
brooding_nice_tokit01: [You see t_c sitting alone near the clearing and decide to approach them.]
[They look up surprised as you slowly slide a little flower over to them.]
[They don't say much, but they seem happy about the small gift.]
brooding_fromparent2: y_c, what happened to your fur?
It's full of thistles, you didn't notice?
[Purring all the while, t_c carefully picks all of the thistles out of your fur.]
brooding_fromparent4: [Even though they're your own parent, t_c clearly has no idea how to talk to you.
unabashed_general: Hi there, little one! Have your parents taught you about how kittens are born yet?
So, you see... When one cat loves another very much...
H-Hey, r_c what are you doing?! I'm just trying to educate the clan's kits!
unabashed_murder: How could you, you little, fox-hearted piece of dung?
I'll gouge your eyes out the first occasion I get!
unabashed_murder1: Stay away from me, you murderer! I don't want anything to do with you!
stable_14: What are you doing here, y_c? You shouldn't be here... I just need time alone, please.

What's it like? It feels like it's eating me up from the inside, tearing me apart, ripping me open, swallowing me whole. This hole, this pit, it's agonising. But- that's the cost to lose someone you love.

With love, comes loss, that's the price we pay. And it's so worth it. Because if we could do it again, we would, and wouldn't change a thing. To love is both a blessing and a curse. Don't let the fear of losing someone stop you from loving them, ever. Cherish every moment, every fight, every breath.
Thank you for visiting me, y_c. You remind me so much of them, thank you... Now run off and play, and please, y_c, never stop loving those around you. Kin or clanmate.
stable_12: Little kit... It's okay, it's okay y_c.
I know this isn't easy, you didn't deserve it- you don't deserve this grief. You're okay, little kit, you're okay. If you need a shoulder to cry on, I'm here. It's okay. It's okay.
Let it out, I'm here for you. It's okay. You're okay, y_c.
unabashed_you_ill: Is there anything I can do to help...?
Even if it's just, I dunno, grabbing some moss for you.
stable_7: Really, you want to hear the song again? Ok, fine... Remember, you asked for this.
There's no place like c_n, because here we are wild and free! And nobody can disagree! Look at the stars, the way they shine! Starclan has given us bountiful time.
And prey and rocks and leaves of gold- may Starclan continue to sing the songs of old. From once before and now onwards, as a clan we strive forward. We push on. And this is the c_nClan cats' song!
